name: World Cup 2002: Group B Quiz | FIFA World Cup | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Spain.

	Spain topped the table winning all three matches.

questions.text: What was the score of the Paraguay vs South Africa match?
questions.explanation:
2-2.

	With Paraguay leading 2-1, Quinton Fortune levelled for South Africa with a penalty in injury time.

questions.text: Spain vs Slovenia: who scored a late penalty for Spain as they emerged 3-1 victors?
questions.explanation:
Fernando Hierro.

	Sebastjan Cimirotic scored Slovenia's only goal of the game while Raul and Valeron were Spain's other scorers.

questions.text: Spain vs Paraguay: what was the score at half-time during this game?
questions.explanation:
Spain 0 Paraguay 1.

	The second half saw Fernando Morientes score twice with a Fernando Hierro penalty completing a 3-1 win for the Spaniards.

questions.text: Spain vs Paraguay: who scored an own goal to give Paraguay the lead?
questions.explanation:
Puyol.

	Spain's goalkeeper Iker Casillas saved the ball which somehow came off the legs of Puyol and rebounded into the goal to give Paraguay the lead.

questions.text: South Africa vs Slovenia: how many goals were scored during this game?
questions.explanation:
1.

	The only goal of the game came as early as the fourth minute when Siyabonga Nomvethe put the ball in from his thigh.

questions.text: South Africa vs Spain: the final score was 3-2 to Spain. How many times did Raul get on the scoresheet during this match?
questions.explanation:
2.

	South Africa levelled the score twice before Raul scored the decisive winner in the 56th minute.

questions.text: Slovenia vs Paraguay: a man from each team was sent off. Who were they?
questions.explanation:
Carlos Paredes (Paraguay) & Nastja Seh (Slovenia).

	Paraguay won the game 3-1 and played most of it with ten men.

questions.text: Who did Spain go on to meet in the second round?
questions.explanation:
Republic of Ireland.

	The second round game would see Spain beat Ireland on penalties after a 1-1 draw.

questions.text: Who did Paraguay, as runners-up in the group, go on to meet in the second round?
questions.explanation:
Germany.

	In the second round game, Paraguay would lose to Germany 1-0 with Oliver Neuville scoring in the 88th minute.
